NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
NCS application - your next steps
Dear Parent or Guardian of {!Contact.Name},
Please complete {!Contact.FirstName}’s application for NCS
Thank you for starting {!Contact.FirstName}’s application for National Citizen Service (NCS). At the moment, parts of this are not complete and we cannot give {!Contact.FirstName} a place until we have received and reviewed these parts. So, we need you ({!Contact.FirstName}'s parent or legal guardian) to provide:
{!NCS_Application__c.Missing_Item_MASI__c}{!NCS_Application__c.Missing_Item_Consent__c}
{!NCS_Application__c.Missing_Item_DOB__c}
{!NCS_Application__c.Missing_Item_School__c}
{!NCS_Application__c.Missing_payment_paragraph__c}{!NCS_Application__c.Missing_Payment_SDD_Not_in_Past__c}{!NCS_Application__c.Missing_Payment_with_Bursary_Call_Due__c}{!NCS_Application__c.Missing_Payment_Bursary_Call_Made__c}
The easiest way to do this and complete {!Contact.FirstName}'s application is by logging in to your online account at bookings.ncsthechallenge.org. If you are unable to complete it online or have any questions, please call us on 0203 542 2400 – we’re always happy to help.
Places are filling up fast, so please complete {!Contact.FirstName}’s application as soon as possible to increase their chances of benefiting from this once-in-a-lifetime experience.
Yours sincerely,
Tanya Dunne Head of Customer Service The Challenge (largest provider of NCS)
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
